Name: Atomic Dog
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A long, refreshing tropical drink with melon, coconut and pineapple juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Atomic Dog contains 232 calories
